summary: Set in Cincinnati at the height of the Great Depression, Kit Kittredge, a resourceful young girl, helps her mother run a boardinghouse after her father loses his job.
cast: Abigail Breslin|Julia Ormond|Chris O'Donnell|Jane Krakowski|Wallace Shawn|Max Thieriot|Willow Smith|Glenne Headly|Zach Mills|Kenneth Welsh|Madison Davenport|Joan Cusack|Stanley Tucci|Dylan Smith|Douglas Nyback|Dylan Roberts|Martin Doyle|Colin Mochrie|Martin Roach|Austin MacDonald|Brieanne Jansen|Erin Hilgartner|Peter MacNeill|Erin McMurtry|Joanna Swan|Eddie Max Huband|Frank McAnulty|Anna Louise Richardson|David Talbot|Darryn Lucio|John Healy|Colette Kendall|Quincy Bullen|Elisabeth Perez|Jordan Rackley|Eddie Graff|Liam Powley-Webster
title: Kit Kittredge: Sueños de periodista
